p: Cells were initially grown photoautotrophically to the middle of the logarithmic phase in F/2 medium. These cells were collected by centrifugation and resuspended again at a density of 2 × 10 6 cells mL −1 in regular F/2 or in the same media completely deficit in nitrogen (N-), phosphorous (P-) or sulphur (S-). Nitrogen concentration in the media was estimated during culture growth spectrophotometrically as described by Yodsuwan et al. [ 108]. Samples for all the analyses were taken immediately after resuspension (control, 0 day) and at the time intervals of 2, 4, 6, 8 and 10 days for further experiments, and the sixth-day samples were analysed for metabolomic profiling.
